lead_paragraph: The United States should directly get to host the 2022 World Cup if Qatar is stripped of the tournament, according to FIFA presidential candidate Jerome Champagne.

headline.print_headline: Champagne Backs United States for 2022 if Qatar Is Stripped
headline.main: Champagne Backs United States for 2022 if Qatar Is Stripped

snippet: The United States should directly get to host the 2022 World Cup if Qatar is stripped of the tournament, according to FIFA presidential candidate Jerome Champagne....
